1.content:
After school on a Friday, you head in to the lab where you and a few friends are working on a device that can shrink or grow things. You are the only one there, so you decide to just go over the specs and view some of the info from prior test runs.

The machine works rather well, but has given the occasional glitch, so before you roll it out as completed, you and your friends have decided to clear as many bugs as possible. While casually scrolling away through the pages upon pages of info, you hear someone walk in and close the door.

“So this is where you go every night, huh?” You turn around to see Caiden standing there. He has his black tank top on with his jeans and black vans. His backpack is slung over his back by one strap. He looked like the typical skater guy, even though he didn’t skateboard. “Pretty much, yeah. We finally have it working well, the machine that is.” You reply back, Caiden walks over, sits down in a chair across from the table the machine is on and stares at it.

“So whats this thing do again?” He asks. “It can grow or shrink any object. We even found a way for it to make things softer or harder. By soft, I mean, almost like a rubber, clay style soft.” You reply, Caiden visibly puzzled just smiles and nods his head. “Here, i’ll give you a demonstration. You grab the remote to control the machine and set a wood pencil on the desk. After setting the machine up, you set the pencil as the target, and press fire.

Suddenly the machine lit up, aiming itself at the pencil. It starts to make a light whirring sound and then it shoots a bright light out, the pencil on the desk started to grow rapidly, about three times its original size in fact. You grab it and show him what the “softener” feature does by bending and molding the pencil. It doesn’t break and just acts like putty.

“Pretty cool, huh?” You say excitedly. You look up at Caiden and he just chuckled while shaking his head. “I mean, it’s cool and all, but really? Whats this thing even good for?” You set the pencil down and roll your eyes. “It can be used to grow food and make more for people to eat, or shrinking a couch to move it easily. Thats why the machine is only the size of a small lamp. Ease of use.” You and your friends have put hours, days, weeks even of your time into this project, it kinda stings that Caiden shows little to no interest. “Can it shrink people? Or grow them?” Caiden suddenly says, you cock your head a bit and raise an eyebrow. “Why would that matter?” You ask, puzzled.

“It doesn’t, but don’t you think it’d be cool? Be able to shrink down and run under doors, and get close to smaller things we normally ant see small.” Caiden replies back quickly. “Well, we haven’t tested it on a living organism. It never was really designed for it.” You set the remote down and stand next to the machine. “Might be worth checking out though. Might have some uses.”

Caiden set his backpack down on the table, when he did, the strap on the one side slapped down on the remote tablet that controls the machine, hitting the shrink button that was displayed. Caiden hadn’t noticed yet, but the machine was pointing right at you, and when he reached in his bag, the strap hit the fire button. In almost an instant, a bright flash and a loud buzz. Caiden shielded his eyes, and when the light went away, you were gone.

In front of him, he saw the tablet flashing “Process complete, proceed to menu?” He was unsure what just happened, the last he saw you, you were by the table. He thought maybe you walked outside without him noticing. So he pressed the ok button on the tablet, and grabbed his bag and started to walk away. “Maybe he won’t know I messed it up? What did I do anyway?”

______________________________________________________________

Choices:
1. At 1-2 inches tall, you appear to be nothing more than a bug Caiden won’t know where you went.

2. 3-5 inches tall, Caiden might notice you while he leaves the room.
1.title: The Shrinkening

choices: 1 inch tall (Soft body, can’t be crushed)
2 inches tall (Normal body, can be crushed)
2 inches tall (Soft body, can’t be crushed)
11.content: What height do you shrink to? Did the machine make your body soft like putty?
11.title: 1-2 Inches tall

choices: You just miss getting stomped by his sole
You don’t react quick enough for how fast his sole came down
114.content:
When you heard the machine turn on, you looked down and saw it point at you, before you could do anything, everything went white. The blinding light of the machine basically immobilized you. You lay on the floor, waiting for your vision to clear, when it finally does, you notice your ears are ringing. You look around, everything is huge! Shit, the machine shrunk me. I wonder if Caiden is still here, maybe he saw me shrink? Did the machine actually shrink me? Damn. This is crazy.

Your thoughts were cut off when you heard a boom from around the corner, your ears still slightly ringing, you figured it must have been Caiden, you venture out in the middle of the aisle between the two tables. You see Caiden walk out from the other side. Coming straight for you, you start to jump, trying to gain his attention. But he isn’t looking down.

Does he not know I shrunk? Shit, I need to get out of his way! By the time you think of this you see the sole of Caidens Vans, the waffle pattern is coming down on you, everything feels like it’s in slow motion. You try to dive away, you think fast, then-
114.title: Reaction Times are Key

choices: Brain feels himself start to fall off the sole, but he can’t go far
Caiden comes back to take his shoes upstairs
1142.content:
Your reaction time wasn’t quite quick enough. Then again, I doubt it would matter, his sole came down like a falling building. All you heard was a loud bang.

Caidens sole made contact with the ground, as he took his step, he unknowingly just smashed his friend into the waffle pattern of his Vans. The now shrunk Brian is pasted to the sole of his friends shoe, much like how gum looks when stepped on. Caiden lifted his foot and kept walking, he didn’t think much of the slight squelch and stick from his shoe sole, and the floors in the school seem to do that when he wears these shoes.

From the sole of the sneaker, Brian has realized he isn’t dead, surprisingly. Wait, how? Did the machine also make my body soft? I didn’t think it could do this stuff to a human... He realized too that he didn’t feel much from getting smashed. It feels like hes getting a light slap, except it’s all over his body. With each step Caiden takes, Brian can feel the momentum. His gooey body collects dirt and debris from the floor. When he got smashed, after the first few steps Brians clothes basically tore off his body. If someone saw Caidens sole, it would look like he stepped on a 2 inch chunk of skin colored Play-Doh.

Caiden proceeded to walk out of the school and start heading home. Little did he realize the torment he’s putting his friend through right now. Caiden took the normal route he took home. He walked down the sidewalk most of the way, then cut through the dirt path near the playground and then into his backyard. On the sole of his Vans, the little brian now looked like a black clump of dirt. Completely flattened into the groove of the sole. Caiden walked inside, kicked his shoes off at the door and walked to his bedroom. Leaving the poor shrunken Brian stuck to the Vans downstairs. The shoe Brian was on laid flat on the ground, not allowing him to even try to un stick him self.

Brians mind was racing. He didn’t know what to think. His brain was basically scrambled. He was just glad he didn’t have the pressure of Caidens weight on him anymore. Now, he just wanted to get off this shoes sole.
1142.title: Like Gum on a Shoe Sole

11421.content:
After what felt like years, you hear someone approaching. It was really about an hour since Caiden got home, but it felt like years to you. You suddenly feel the sneaker you’re stuck to lifting up. The sole was held backwards so you just saw behind whoever was holding the shoe. Was this Caiden? Why did he come grab his shoes randomly? At the top of the stairs you noticed whoever had the shoes in their grasp turned left, Caidens room was down the right hall. That must mean, this is his brother, Joey.

But why did he grab Caidens shoes? Did he confuse them for his? No... Maybe he could find you on the sole and take you to Caiden. Then suddenly the shoes were dropped to the floor, the sole you were on facing the ceiling, you can see, it is definitely Joeys room. You could hear him above you, mumbling to himself on his bed. what is this boy up to? you think, then suddenly, he leans his arm over the side and grabs the shoe you were stuck to.

You then realize, to your horror, the real reason he grabbed his brothers shoes. He had his tablet set up against the wall so he could watch the porn that was up, as he was jerking himself watching, he started to rub the sneakers sole on his dick. You felt the friction, the young boys cock rubbing up the shoe sole, and rubbing on you. You were disgusted. Or so you thought, you could feel your own flattened penis trying to rise.

No, why is this turning me on, stop... The boy started to speed up his rhythm. You felt erect penis pop up on one of the strokes, then get flattened against your body when he came back, then Joey pumped again, sliding your penis back and getting it smashed between his cock and the shoe sole. This boys penis wasn’t all that big, but it wasn’t small either, especially for his age.

When Joey neared completion, he laid the shoe flat on his stomach and finished rubbing himself with his hand, and blew his load all over the sole of the sneaker, some even got passed the shoes sole and onto his chest. Joey was panting and wiped the dribble from his chest with his finger and licked it, he then took the shoe and raised it to his face, and started to lick the semen from its sole, running his tongue along it, he catches something weird, and looks down.

In front of him, is what looks like a black chunk of dirt, but it’s shaped weird. Almost, like a tiny human? Thats when he starts to peel you off, and he sees your scuffed up, dirty penis, and your body starts to reform its shape now that it’s detached from the shoe. Joey, while absolutely confused, smiles with an evil look. He spits on your body and wipes it on the floor, cleaning some of the dirt from you.

“Well, well, well. What do we have here? How’d Brian wind up on Caidens big sneaker sole? Did you like my cock rubbing your body? I see that little chub you got.” Joey mockingly said to you. “You need to take me to Caiden, Joey, he can get me grown back to full size.” You plead to the giant boy in front of you. You try not to respond to his mocking questions, you don’t want to think about wat just happened.

“Why should I? The way I see it, with you shrunk like this, you can’t take Caiden from me. I think a better plan for you would be to just get accustomed to being my little play thing.” The words he just said to you sent shivers down your back, did he really just say that? You’re not a play thing, you’re a person, given a small person, but that’s not relevant. “Joey, this isn’t a joke, ple-“ Right in the middle of you talking Joey flicked your body with his free hand. “Don’t call me Joey, i’m master now. Understand?”

The flick hurt, but not much. It felt more like pain than being flattened under sole. You knew there wasn’t much of a choice here, but maybe this is just a sick game? Should you give in, or resist Joey?
11421.title: Younger Brothers Revenge

info.brief_description: Your team project causes you to shrink, and adventures are about to be had.
info.description:
Brief Intro:
You are Brian, an 18 year old with a passion for building things. Your mechanical knowledge paired with a few science type students turned out a machine that can grow or shrink objects. Originally designed to make moving large items easier or making food larger to sustain more people, it was never meant to be used on people. But one day when in the lab, something goes wrong, and you wind up shrunk.

_______________________________________________________________

Characters:

Brian (You): 18, He is average in about every way, originally 6’ 1” and has a slightly muscular build. Has mechanical knowledge.

Caiden: 16, Good friend of Brians, has a slightly sadistic side, 5’ 8” and slim.

Joey: 13, Caidens younger brother, despises Brian because he “takes” Caiden away from him when they hang out. 5’ 6” and fit.

Sarah: 17, Nerdy girl who helped Brian make the machine, has a crush on Brian. 5’ 7” and slightly chubby.

More will be added as the story progresses.
_______________________________________________________________

Rules:
Chapters must be relevant to the story, and in paragraph format, keep short chapters to a minimum.
Brian can die, but don’t make it quick and without buildup. Make some details.
Interactions can be m/m or f/m, but the story will start with m/m.
Anything is allowed, gore, sexual interactions, etc.
Worthless or badly written chapters will be removed.

_______________________________________________________________

Feel free to add chapters, and i’m always open for contact, let me know if you want to see me add something. I’m going to try and regularly add to the story. The main storyline i’m focus on is what happens to Brian when he is 2 inches tall and un crushable.
